item.title: OpenZeppelin
item.description: Upgradable contract # https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kWUDTZhxKZI&list=WL&index=19 proxy pattern # user interact with the proxy contract the proxy will point to another smart contract When upgrading the contract, the admin of the proxy contract points the proxy to another smart contract storage
